Name: Discord Messenger
Description: Discord Messenger allows you to send highly customizable formatted messages to your Discord Server. Templates for Simple Message, Custom Embed Message, Twitch Now Streaming, YouTube Video, & Twitter Post. Automated images & Information for some templates. Customization settings are dependent on template used: Name of Posting User, Avatar URL for Posting User, Message from Posting User, Enable/Disable Text to Speech, Embed Author Information, Author Icon Image URL, Author Name Link, Embedded Post Side Bar Color, Embedded Post Thumbnail URL, Embedded Post Title, Embedded Post Title Link, Embedded Post Title Description, Embedded Post Field #1 - Heading, Embedded Post Field #1 Text, Embedded Post Field #1 - Heading, Embedded Post Field #1 Text, Option for Inline on/off, Main Image URL, Embedded Post Footer Icon URL, Embedded Post Footer Text, Twitch Channel Name, Stream Topic/Game, Twitter Username, URL of Twitter Post, YouTube Video URL, YouTube Channel Name, & Video Description. Please visit the URL below for images and a full description.

Localization.Enter your Discord Webhook URL: DiscordのWebhookのリンクを入力する
Localization.Posting User Information: アップするユーザーの情報
Localization.Twitter Username (No @ Symbol): Twitterのユーザー名(@マーク除き)
Localization.Avatar URL for Posting User: アップしたユーザーのアバターのリンク
Localization.Embedded Post Side Bar Color: 埋め込みツイートの背景色
Localization.Video Description (max. 40 chars): 動画について(最大40文字以内)
Localization.Stream Topic/Game (max. 40 chars): 配信のタイトルやゲーム名(最大40文字以内)
Localization.Title: Title
